document_data.name: Feline Form
document_data.mainbody: '''''Feline form''''' was a powerful [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] used by specialty priests devoted to [[Nobanion]] called [[Firemane]]s, enabling them to ''[[shapechange]]'' into any feline species.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to ''shapechange'' into any feline species, including partial transformations. Once transformed the caster had access to the species' natural abilities including both their strengths and weaknesses. The caster's form could be changed at will with the process taking only a second. If slain while using this spell the caster would remain in whatever form they selected at the time of their death.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s locks of hair from three different feline species to cast.
